title._content: [Dr. Alexander Harris of 15th Virginia Infantry Regiment in uniform and Dr. Harris with his wife after the war] (LOC)

description._content: Rees, Charles R.,, photographer. [Dr. Alexander Harris of 15th Virginia Infantry Regiment in uniform and Dr. Harris with his wife after the war] [between 1862 and 1870] 2 photographs : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 15.9 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 1-14. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (2010:105-5) Purchased from: Bill Turner, La Plata, Maryland, 2011. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Subjects: Confederate States of America.--Army.--Virginia Infantry Regiment, 15th--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Physicians--1860-1870. Women--1860-1870. Couples--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Group portraits--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32468 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 5063
